name: Chikorita
flavor_text: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up the sun's rays.

name: Bayleef
flavor_text: The buds that ring its neck give off a spicy aroma that perks people up.

name: Meganium
flavor_text: The aroma that rises from its petals contains a substance that calms aggressive feelings.

name: Cyndaquil
flavor_text: It is timid, and always curls it­ self up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.

name: Quilava
flavor_text: Be careful if it turns its back during battle. It means that it will attack with the fire on its back.

name: Typhlosion
flavor_text: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.

name: Totodile
flavor_text: Its well-developed jaws are powerful and capable of crushing anything. Even its trainer must be careful.

name: Croconaw
flavor_text: If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.

name: Feraligatr
flavor_text: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.

name: Sentret
flavor_text: A very cautious POKéMON, it raises itself up using its tail to get a better view of its surroundings.

name: Furret
flavor_text: The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.

name: Hoothoot
flavor_text: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

name: Noctowl
flavor_text: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.

name: Ledyba
flavor_text: It is very timid. It will be afraid to move if it is alone. But it will be active if it is in a group.

name: Ledian
flavor_text: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.

name: Spinarak
flavor_text: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

name: Ariados
flavor_text: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It is hard to tell which end is which.

name: Crobat
flavor_text: It flies so si­ lently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.

name: Chinchou
flavor_text: It shoots positive and negative elec­ tricity between the tips of its two antennae and zaps its enemies.

name: Lanturn
flavor_text: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea's surface from a depth of over three miles.

name: Pichu
flavor_text: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.

name: Cleffa
flavor_text: According to local rumors, Cleffa are often seen in places where shooting stars have fallen.

name: Igglybuff
flavor_text: It has a very soft body. If it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.

name: Togepi
flavor_text: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

name: Togetic
flavor_text: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, car­ ing people and shower them with happiness.

name: Natu
flavor_text: Because its wings aren't yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always star­ ing at something.

name: Xatu
flavor_text: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.

name: Mareep
flavor_text: If static elec­ tricity builds in its body, its fleece doubles in volume. Touching it will shock you.

name: Flaaffy
flavor_text: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won't grow.

name: Ampharos
flavor_text: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.

name: Bellossom
flavor_text: BELLOSSOM gather at times and appear to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.

name: Marill
flavor_text: The tip of its tail, which con­ tains oil that is lighter than wa­ ter, lets it swim without drowning.

name: Azumarill
flavor_text: By keeping still and listening in­ tently, it can tell what is in even wild, fast- moving rivers.

name: Sudowoodo
flavor_text: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composi­ tion appears to be closer to a rock than a plant.

name: Politoed
flavor_text: If POLIWAG and POLIWHIRL hear its echoing cry, they respond by gather­ ing from far and wide.

name: Hoppip
flavor_text: To keep from being blown away by the wind, they gather in clusters. They do enjoy gentle breezes, though.

name: Skiploom
flavor_text: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluc­ tuates up and down.

name: Jumpluff
flavor_text: Once it catches the wind, it deft­ ly controls its cotton-puff spores to float, even around the world.

name: Aipom
flavor_text: Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a tree branch and hold itself up in the air.

name: Sunkern
flavor_text: It may drop out of the sky suddenly. If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will violently shake its leaves.

name: Sunflora
flavor_text: It converts sun­ light into energy. In the darkness after sunset, it closes its petals and becomes still.

name: Yanma
flavor_text: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter win­ dows in the area.

name: Wooper
flavor_text: This POKéMON lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.

name: Quagsire
flavor_text: This carefree POKéMON has an easy-going nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.

name: Espeon
flavor_text: It uses the fine hair that covers its body to sense air currents and predict its ene­ my's actions.

name: Umbreon
flavor_text: When agitated, this POKéMON pro­ tects itself by spraying poisonous sweat from its pores.

name: Murkrow
flavor_text: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

name: Slowking
flavor_text: It has incredible intellect and in­ tuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.

name: Misdreavus
flavor_text: It likes playing mischievous tricks such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night.

name: Unown
flavor_text: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.

name: Wobbuffet
flavor_text: It hates light and shock. If attack­ ed, it inflates its body to pump up its counter­ strike.

name: Girafarig
flavor_text: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent and bite.

name: Pineco
flavor_text: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn't bother it.

name: Forretress
flavor_text: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside the armor is a total mystery.

name: Dunsparce
flavor_text: DUNSPARCE has a drill for its tail. It uses this tail to burrow into the ground backwards. This POKéMON is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.

name: Gligar
flavor_text: It flies straight at its target’s face, then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.

name: Steelix
flavor_text: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.

name: Snubbull
flavor_text: Although it looks frightening, it is actually kind and affectionate. It is very popular among women.

name: Granbull
flavor_text: It is actually timid and easily spooked. If at­ tacked, it flails about to fend off its attacker.

name: Qwilfish
flavor_text: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.

name: Scizor
flavor_text: It swings its eye- patterned pincers up to scare its foes. This makes it look like it has three heads.

name: Shuckle
flavor_text: The BERRIES it stores in its vase-like shell decompose and become a gooey liquid.

name: Heracross
flavor_text: This powerful POKéMON thrusts its prized horn under its enemies’ bellies then lifts and throws them.

name: Sneasel
flavor_text: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it sud­ denly extends the claws and startles its enemy.

name: Teddiursa
flavor_text: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because they are soaked with honey.

name: Ursaring
flavor_text: Although it is a good climber, it prefers to snap trees with its forelegs and eat fallen BERRIES.

name: Slugma
flavor_text: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn’t keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

name: Magcargo
flavor_text: The shell on its back is just skin that has cooled and hardened. It breaks easily with a slight touch.

name: Swinub
flavor_text: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.

name: Piloswine
flavor_text: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.

name: Corsola
flavor_text: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure for its beauty.

name: Remoraid
flavor_text: It squirts water forcefully from its mouth to shoot down flying prey.

name: Octillery
flavor_text: It traps enemies with its suction- cupped tentacles then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

name: Delibird
flavor_text: It carries food all day long. There are tales about lost people who were saved by the food it had.

name: Mantine
flavor_text: As it majestically swims, it doesn't care if REMORAID attach to it for scavenging its leftovers.

name: Skarmory
flavor_text: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.

name: Houndour
flavor_text: It uses different kinds of cries for communicating with others of its kind and for pursuing its prey.

name: Houndoom
flavor_text: If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its mouth, the pain will never go away.

name: Kingdra
flavor_text: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.

name: Phanpy
flavor_text: It swings its long snout around play­ fully, but because it is so strong, that can be dan­ gerous.

name: Donphan
flavor_text: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough to knock down a house.

name: Porygon2
flavor_text: This upgraded version of PORYGON is designed for space exploration. It can't fly, though.

name: Stantler
flavor_text: Those who stare at its antlers will gradually lose control of their senses and be unable to stand.

name: Smeargle
flavor_text: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.

name: Tyrogue
flavor_text: It is always bursting with en­ ergy. To make it­ self stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.

name: Hitmontop
flavor_text: If you become enchanted by its smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks, you may get drilled hard.

name: Smoochum
flavor_text: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.

name: Elekid
flavor_text: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can’t store the energy it makes.

name: Magby
flavor_text: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils.

name: Miltank
flavor_text: Its milk is packed with nutrition, making it the ultimate beverage for the sick or weary.

name: Blissey
flavor_text: Anyone who takes even one bite of BLISSEY's egg be­ comes unfailingly caring and pleas­ ant to everyone.

name: Raikou
flavor_text: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.

name: Entei
flavor_text: Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Un­ able to restrain its extreme power, it races headlong around the land.

name: Suicune
flavor_text: Said to be the reincarnation of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.

name: Larvitar
flavor_text: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it will fall asleep so it can grow.

name: Pupitar
flavor_text: Its shell is as hard as sheet rock, and it is also very strong. Its THRASHING can topple a mountain.

name: Tyranitar
flavor_text: Its body can't be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.

name: Lugia
flavor_text: It is said that it quietly spends its time deep at the bottom of the sea because its powers are too strong.

name: Ho-Oh
flavor_text: Legends claim this POKéMON flies the world's skies con­ tinuously on its magnificent seven- colored wings.

name: Celebi
flavor_text: This POKéMON wan­ ders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.
